Compensation Philosophy.Description: You will get raises, cash bonuses and stock refreshers yearly to try to keep you happy. You get larger raises if you get promoted.

Snacks.Description: Fully stocked mini kitchens (chips, cookies, fruit etc)

Coffee/Drinks.Description: Juice bars, french press coffee machines, soda, juice, milk, bottled drinks etc.

401k Matching.Description: The higher of a 50% match up to ie. $9000 or 100% match up to $3000

Mental Health/Therapy.Description: Free 24/7 access to confidential counselling services

Company Holidays.Description: 12 days (MLK Day, Presidents Day, Memorial Day, Labor Day, New Years + 1 day, Independence Day + 1 day Thanksgiving + 1 day Christmas + 1 day)

Cell Phone Allowance.Description: $70/month or go on their corporate plan

Maternity/Paternity Leave.Description: 18 weeks paid maternity leave, 4 weeks off before birth and 12 weeks paid paternity leave. $500 baby cash

Childcare.Description: Free premium membership to Care.com and 10 subsidized days of in-home or in-center childcare

Adoption Assistance.Description: up to $25000 for agency fees or legal expenses. up to $25000 for surrogacy fees

Onsite Facilities.Description: Physicians and nurses for health/wellness available onsite. Onsite massage therapists and confidential counseling service.

Break time activities.Description: Ping pong tables, foosball, arcades depending on building

Tuition.Description: 1/3 off up to $1000 for non-work related courses, 2/3 off up to $10000 for work related courses

Health Insurance.Description: Basic: Vision: $0 ($150 for frames per year) Dental: $0 (100% coverage for preventitive care, 60% off for major operations) General: $0(Deductible: $1300/individuals, $2600/family)

Other.Description: Oncall pay at 1x, 0.66x or 0.33x of your base salary depending on the tier of your service. Caps at 80 hrs per quarter Free cooking lessons on site Free fitness classes on site Internet allowance (75$/month)

Compensation Philosophy.Description: You will get raises, cash bonuses and stock refreshers yearly to try to keep you happy. You get larger raises if you get promoted.

PTO/Sick Days.Description: 21 days includes vacation and pto. Unlimited sick days. 1 month off every 5 years.

Snacks.Description: Fully stocked mini kitchens (chips, cookies, fruit etc)

Coffee/Drinks.Description: Juice bars, french press coffee machines, soda, juice, milk, bottled drinks etc.

401k Matching.Description: 50% match up to 7% of your base pay. For Example: $3500 on $7000 contribution with a base pay of $100,000

Mental Health/Therapy.Description: 25 free therapy session/yr for you and dependents

Company Holidays.Description: 11 holidays ( New Year’s Day, MLK Day, Presidents’ Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day + 1 day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day + 1 day, Christmas Day + 1 day)

Cell Phone Allowance.Description: Free company phone w/ paid service

Maternity/Paternity Leave.Description: Mothers receive 16 weeks (~4 months) paid maternity leave plus 6-8 weeks of paid disability leave. Fathers receive 16 weeks (~4 months) paid paternity leave. $4000 baby cash

Childcare.Description: $3000/yr for childcare expenses 10 uses/yr of back-up care including in-home care for a child, adult or elder

Adoption Assistance.Description: $10000 for fees related to adoption $20000 for fees related to surrogacy

Onsite Facilities.Description: Doctors on call (health center at worki including prescriptions, vaccines, dental and vision) Barber on site (MLP office) Dry cleaning and laundry

Break time activities.Description: Ping pong tables, foosball, arcades depending on building

Health Insurance.Description: Basic Vision: $0 ($10 copay for vision exam, 25$ copay for frames and lenses, $150 for frames, $150 for contacts), $2000 for lasik (1 time only) Dental: $0 (Deductable: 50$ in general, 0$ for preventitive care, $2000 max benefit/year) General: $0 (Single: Deductable: $250, max out of pocket: $1500) (Family: $500, max out of pocket: $3000)

Other.Description: 250$ FB ad credit to use or give away. Laundry and drycleaning onsite or reimbursement. Free valet parking.
